item.title: Varrock Wild Zone
item.dc:creator: @mich702703 mich702703
item.description:
@mich702703 wrote:

Ive got the Full wildy here:

public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if (Type == 1) { if ((coordY >= 3523) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942) || absX >= 3220 && absX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <=3548 || absX >= 2250 && absX <= 2296 && absY >= 4676 && absY <=4715) { return true; } } else if (Type == 2) { if ((coordY >= 3512) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942)) { return true; } } return false; }

Read full topic

item.title: Varrock Wild Zone
item.dc:creator: @pobdol pobdol
item.description:
@pobdol wrote:

Hello everyone, I’m currently using Chris-Scape Source and I was wanting to change the Lumbridge from wild to safe zone, I’d also like to make a wild zone, I want the official Runescape Varrock wild, I’ve been told to do the coords and everything I’ve tried and it won’t work, could someone give me the coords?

This is what I got:

public boolean IsInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if (Type == 1) { if (coordY >= 3520 && coordY <= 3967 && coordX <= 3392 && coordX >= 2942) { return true; } } if (Type == 2) { if (coordY >= 9761 && coordY <= 9755 && coordX <= 3175 && coordX >= 3161) { return true; } } return false;

I would also like to know how to remove objexts that mdont let you past, I’ve tried removing the ID’s and everything but nothing happens.

Read full topic
